description: Updates an Amazon Kinesis Video Stream pool in a media pipeline.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the requested resource. Valid values include the name and ARN of the media pipeline Kinesis Video Stream pool.

parameters.name: StreamConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration settings for the video stream. DataRetentionInHours (integer) --- The updated time that data is retained.

nested_params.name: DataRetentionInHours
nested_params.description: The updated time that data is retained.

nested_items.name: KinesisVideoStreamPoolConfiguration
nested_items.description: The video stream pool configuration object.

nested_items.name: PoolArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the video stream pool configuration.

nested_items.name: PoolName
nested_items.description: The name of the video stream pool configuration.

nested_items.name: PoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the video stream pool in the configuration.

nested_items.name: PoolStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the video stream pool in the configuration.

nested_items.name: PoolSize
nested_items.description: The size of the video stream pool in the configuration.

nested_items.name: StreamConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Kinesis video stream pool configuration object.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the video stream.

nested_items.name: DataRetentionInHours
nested_items.description: The amount of time that data is retained.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration was updated.
